name: Marin
text:
The compass always points to adventure!

Obtainable by purchasing in the shop.

name: Hakkar
text:
He likes to win by tooth, fang, and claw.

Purchasable when available in the shop.

name: Spectral Garden
text:
Deep below the spectral gloom,
a ghostly garden will slowly bloom.

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, August 2024.

name: King Krush
text:
If the water in the footprint starts rippling, it’s time to run!

Purchasable when available in the shop.

name: Boulderfist
text:
Just like its namesake, this card back is utterly SMASHING!

Purchasable when available in the shop.

name: Patches
text:
He likes to keep an eye on things—like card backs.

Purchasable when available in the shop.

name: Darion Mograine
text: Only the most virtuous Knight of the Ebon Blade is worthy of wielding this card back in battle. Earnable after purchasing the March of the Lich King Tavern Pass, or purchasable when available in the Shop.

name: Faelin
text: Though his voyage was a pricy one, no sunk cost was too great for him. Earnable after purchasing the Voyage to the Sunken City Tavern Pass, or purchasable when available in the Shop.
